topics.body:
Yahtzee has said it himself

"Nobody likes it when I review a good game."

While I don't think his positive reviews are Awful, I just don't think they're as good as the ones that exaggerate every minor flaw.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d7f38d6368724a91490000#post_53d7f38d6368724a91490000
But his opinions on a 'good' game are extremely flawed and often contradictory to _himself_.

Call of Duty: I don't like the bland colours.
Halo 4: I don't like the bright, neon colours.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d7f576636872213f2f0100#post_53d7f576636872213f2f0100
I just said that he exaggerates for the sake of comedy.

As for Silent Hill 2, He believes that Clunky controls can enhance horror games.

And I doubt that the Bright neon colors thing wasn't an exaggeration.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d7f6666368724a91ea0000#post_53d7f6666368724a91ea0000
Actually, having played Halo, it's not that bad.
I'm just saying that he's very backwards. Something he says is a negative quality in one game is suddenly a postive one in another.
And as Squiggly said, his rants...eh, are just baseless most if the time.
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d7f7556368727fa38d0000#post_53d7f7556368727fa38d0000
I think the problem is that you two are taking him too seriously.

He's a Comedian first and a Game critic second.

I've watched pretty much all of his videos, And I can even I can tell what's exaggeration and what's his actual opinions.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d7f7f763687221008a0000#post_53d7f7f763687221008a0000
He's not a game critic at all if he exaggerates.
It's like Doug Walker's Bum Reviews, except with no charm and no little disclaimer saying "But really, I thought (insert true opinion here)"
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

I think When He's actually speaking his own thoughts rather than writing for a Character, (Like in Medal of honor warfighter & Doom 3 and Spec ops the line) He's actually quite profound.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d802a363687278aa0e0100#post_53d802a363687278aa0e0100
Let me find it and Quote it.

"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d75727636872457a810100#post_53d75727636872457a810100
[bq="trashboat"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d756036368726ea0ad0000#post_53d756036368726ea0ad0000
It's a long running series of Tokusatsu (Even older than Kamen rider)

They're basically about Men who fuse with Giant aliens among the stars, Get involved with special military Squads that Defends the world from Kaiju (I think so) And the Men can become the Aliens in order to fight the kaiju.

If you like Godzilla, You should like Ultra (The original, Ultraseven, And Mebius are good starts from what I've heard)[/bq]
